ask_about: a pizza with any size of the following: small, medium, large, extra large
response: Of course! We offer pizzas in small, medium, and big sizes. Could you please tell me what size you would like for your pizza?

ask_about: any of the following for toppings: mushrooms, tomato, onion, cheese, olives, pepperoni
response: Absolutely, I can help with that. Our available toppings are cheese, mushrooms, pepper, ham, bacon, pepperoni, olives, corn, and chicken. Please let me know which toppings you would like on your large pizza.
